actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: To guarantee that every employee of Federal Government shall have the right to refain from union activity.

summary.text: Provides that every employee of the Federal Government shall have the right to refrain from union activity. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 7103)

titles.title: To guarantee that every employee of Federal Government shall have the right to refain from union activity.
